body:
Took a look through the docs after #1576 was merged to make sure I didn't break anything. Found a few more bugs to fix:
- Grammar mistakes in Basic Usage
- Broken link in Packaging Guide
- Replaced `--force` and `--profile` with `-f` and `-p`
  - I actually wanted all of them to be the long name, but Sphinx messes them up in the [Command Index](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/command_index.html). It's formatting the double dash as an en-dash because it doesn't keep the double backticks formatting.

@citibeth @tgamblin
title: Fix various documentation bugs
